speaker: player
text: Looks like this is the desk of the ship's doctor?

speaker: player
text: The final log entry is still accessible...

speaker: player
text: "With the shuttle repaired and the trajectory that Edgar worked out, we can go and get help."

speaker: player
text: "Robert wants to stay behind to fix the antenna."

speaker: player
text: Seems like everyone except this Robert guy took of with the shuttle.
